DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , single-arm multi-center study provide clinical data observational setting use Echelon Flex™ 45 60 Powered ENDOPATH® Stapler Articulating Endoscopic Linear Cutters ( study Endocutter ) . Individuals undergo VATS lobectomy suspect confirmed Non Small Cell Lung Cancer ( NSCLC ) , individual undergo VATS diagnostic wedge resection accordance institution 's Standard care ( SOC ) , meet study entry criterion , may enrol . Study procedure include wedge resection , wedge resection follow lobectomy lobe , lobectomy .
DOC.brief_title: Powered Surgical Stapler VATS Lung Resection Procedures China
DOC.criteria: 1 . Suspected confirmed NSCLC ( include Stage II ) , individual undergo VATS diagnostic wedge resection accordance institution 's Standard care ( SOC ) ; 2 . Scheduled lung resection surgery ( lobectomy wedge resection ) involve one lobe lung ; 3 . Performance status 01 ( Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group classification ) ; 4 . ASA score < 3 ; 5 . No prior history VATS open lung surgery ; 6 . Willing give consent comply studyrelated evaluation treatment schedule ; 7 . At least 18 year age .
